Description:
Detects the execution of "gpg.exe" from uncommon location. Often used by ransomware and loaders to decrypt/encrypt data.

Author: frack113, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Portable Gpg.EXE Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((process_path like '%\gpg.exe' or process_path like '%\gpg2.exe') and original_file_name = 'gpg.exe' and description = 'GnuPGâ€™s OpenPGP tool') and  not (process_path like '%:\Program Files (x86)\GNU\GnuPG\bin\%' or process_path like '%:\Program Files (x86)\GnuPG VS-Desktop\%' or process_path like '%:\Program Files (x86)\GnuPG\bin\%' or process_path like '%:\Program Files (x86)\Gpg4win\bin\%'))
